summary: AN ORDINANCE accepting electrical underground distribution easements over portions of Section 12, Township 23 North, Range 3 East, W.M.; Homecroft Addition; Forest Spring; Section 10, Township 25 North, Range 3 East, W.M.; Pontius 2nd Addition; First Addition to Lake Forest Park; Vacated portions of Pike Place and Pike Street; et al placing said easements under the jurisdiction of the City Light Department.
